languages.text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Я должна была узреть земельный оттенок предательства, скрипящий на ее зубах". {n}Кассия виновато поджимает губы.{/n} "Но цвета ксеносов такие... такие едкие. Разнообразие оттенков сводит с ума, стоит лишь задержать на них взгляд".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Я должна была узреть земельный оттенок предательства, скрипящий на ее зубах". {n}Кассия виновато поджимает губы.{/n} "Но цвета ксеносов такие... такие едкие. Разнообразие оттенков сводит с ума, стоит лишь задержать на них взгляд".
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."
languages.original_text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан. Я должна была узреть земельный оттенок предательства, скрипящий на ее зубах". {n}Кассия виновато поджимает губы.{/n} "Но цвета ксеносов такие... такие едкие. Разнообразие оттенков сводит с ума, стоит лишь задержать на них взгляд".

traits.locale_text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我很抱歉，舰长大人。我本该瞥见她牙齿之间咯吱作响的土黄色，那是背叛的颜色。”{n}卡西娅愧疚地抿着嘴唇。{/n}“但异形的颜色实在是太……太繁复了。光是目光落在他们身上，各种各样的颜色就会令人发狂。”
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."

traits.locale_text: “我很抱歉，舰长大人。我本该瞥见她牙齿之间咯吱作响的土黄色，那是背叛的颜色。”{n}卡西娅愧疚地抿着嘴唇。{/n}“但异形的颜色实在是太……太繁复了。光是目光落在他们身上，各种各样的颜色就会令人发狂。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."

languages.text: «Lo siento, Lord Capitán. Debería haber visto el terroso tono de la traición entre sus dientes». {n}Cassia, culpable, aprieta los labios.{/n} «Pero los colores xenos son tan... fétidos. Su variedad de tonos enloquece a cualquiera solo con mirarlos».
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."

traits.locale_text: «Lo siento, Lord Capitán. Debería haber visto el terroso tono de la traición entre sus dientes». {n}Cassia, culpable, aprieta los labios.{/n} «Pero los colores xenos son tan... fétidos. Su variedad de tonos enloquece a cualquiera solo con mirarlos».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。彼女の歯の間から、裏切りという土のような色彩を見てとるべきでした」{n}カシアは後ろめたそうに唇をとがらせる。{/n}「ですが、異種族の色はとても…とても豊かなのです。その色合いの多様さは、それに眼差しを向けたとたんに狂気を誘うほどです」
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."

traits.locale_text: 「申し訳ありません、ロード・キャプテン。彼女の歯の間から、裏切りという土のような色彩を見てとるべきでした」{n}カシアは後ろめたそうに唇をとがらせる。{/n}「ですが、異種族の色はとても…とても豊かなのです。その色合いの多様さは、それに眼差しを向けたとたんに狂気を誘うほどです」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Es tut mir leid, Lord Captain. Ich hätte die irdenen Töne des Verrates erkennen müssen, die zwischen ihren Zähnen knirschten." {n}Cassia schürzt schuldbewusst die Lippen.{/n} "Doch Xenos-Farben sind so ... so widerwärtig. Die Vielfalt an Farbtönen raubt einem den Verstand, sobald man sie erblickt."
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."

traits.locale_text: "Es tut mir leid, Lord Captain. Ich hätte die irdenen Töne des Verrates erkennen müssen, die zwischen ihren Zähnen knirschten." {n}Cassia schürzt schuldbewusst die Lippen.{/n} "Doch Xenos-Farben sind so ... so widerwärtig. Die Vielfalt an Farbtönen raubt einem den Verstand, sobald man sie erblickt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'aurais dû voir les nuances ocre de la traîtrise suinter de sa bouche. » {n}Cassia pince les lèvres, l'air coupable.{/n} « Mais les couleurs des xénos sont tellement... fétides. Ils ont tant de nuances que j'ai l'impression de perdre la tête rien qu'en posant les yeux sur eux. »
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."

traits.locale_text: « Toutes mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. J'aurais dû voir les nuances ocre de la traîtrise suinter de sa bouche. » {n}Cassia pince les lèvres, l'air coupable.{/n} « Mais les couleurs des xénos sont tellement... fétides. Ils ont tant de nuances que j'ai l'impression de perdre la tête rien qu'en posant les yeux sur eux. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Onun ağzından çıkan kalleşliğin bulanık tonlarını görebilmem gerekirdi." {n}Cassia suçlulukla dudak büzüyor.{/n} "Gel gör ki zenoların renkleri gerçekten... Midemi kaldırıyor. Renk tonlarının çeşitliliği, görür görmez cinnet geçirmeme sebep oluyor."
languages.original_text: "I am sorry, Lord Captain. I should have glimpsed the earthen hue of treachery that creaked between her teeth." {n}Cassia purses her lips guiltily.{/n} "But xenos colours are so... so rank. The variety of hues becomes maddening as soon as you rest your gaze on them."

traits.locale_text: "Özür dilerim Lord Kaptan. Onun ağzından çıkan kalleşliğin bulanık tonlarını görebilmem gerekirdi." {n}Cassia, suçlulukla dudak büzüyor.{/n} "Gel gör ki zenoların renkleri gerçekten... Midemi kaldırıyor. Renk tonlarının çeşitliliği, görür görmez cinnet geçirmeme sebep oluyor."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
